list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a written or printed work consisting of pages glued or sewn together along one side and bound in covers.
a bound set of blank sheets for writing or keeping records in.
a set of tickets, stamps, matches, checks, samples of cloth, etc., bound together.
reserve (accommodations, a place, etc.); buy (a ticket) in advance.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I have booked a table at the Swan
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã đặt một cái bàn tại Swan

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make an official record of the name and other personal details of (a criminal suspect or offender).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the cop booked me and took me down to the station
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cop đặt tôi và đưa tôi xuống nhà ga
